extendedInfo.description: ââââââRead CarefullyââââââIf you already installed a free version(version of non changeable icon), replace the previous version by downloading a new version.  ===Manual===1. Day 1 is considered as the first day of meeting.2. First time of install, option is applied by lowering the notice board, located at the top.3. Date and numbers may be resistered on the resister option.4. Instruction Detail          a. Resister - Input the calculated date and phone number.                  - Image is changeable, the image changes after 10 seconds of selection          b. Anniversary - Check the saved anniversaries, or see the list of individually saved date of anniversaries                               - Edit and deletion is possible when press the registered list for a moment.          c. Make a call - Make a instant call to registered number          d. Send a message - Send a text message to the registered number          e. Send a messgae with picture - Send a text message with a picture to the registered number          f.  Register anniversary - Register a desired anniversary D-dayDetailed information may be checked from the bar at the top, the title and detail would be edited.Initial values should be editedIf it is stored to the sd card, it is not running during startSave into inner memoryminimum of 2.1 to operate - Thanks to Kang Huiseung
